about_the_game:
Hard Vacuum is a single-player space combat game developed from the ground up for virtual reality. It features fully interactive cockpits using motion controllers or using a gaze system in combination with a HOTAS or gamepad.

Current features:


  • Three flyable ships with fully interactive cockpits
  • Fly with motion controllers, HOTAS or gamepad
  • Newtonian physics - toggle flight assist on or off
  • AI wingmen with a streamlined command system
  • Unlock new weapons and upgrade ship systems

Game modes:


  • A narrative-driven campaign featuring a diverse range of scenarios
  • Mercenary - a dynamic campaign with randomised missions. Earn credits and upgrade your ship and wingmen on your path to a final confrontation
  • Sustain: Hold out against multiple waves of hostile craft
